content: I am satisfied with the app and the service. I am a free user but I get excellent service from the team when I encountered a bug. I didn't expect to get a reply from the developer but they replied me. (The bug: Sometimes events disappear after saving. Need to remake events several times. After contacting customer support, they told me to clear cache and reinstall it, and it worked flawlessly.) The app works smoothly, the design is simple, easy to use, and light. I like it.
replyContent: We would be happy to help you resolve all of the issues you have encountered should you send us a bug report via (Settings-Bug Report).

content: I love this app, it looks stunning and clean which personally is important to me, and everything works smoothly as intended- setting reminders for tasks, repetition, notes, etc. One thing I'd like is for "subtasks" to be able to appear on the main task page under the main task, maybe a button to toggle this. If there already is, I'm not sure how to access it. Other than that, I'm excited to use the app to be more organized.
replyContent: Glad to hear that Any.do is helping you stay organized! As per displaying the Subtasks on the lists, we've forwarded this idea to our Product Team, and will be sure to look into adding them, should we see more demand from our users! Hope you will share the app with your friends and family so they can have their productivity boosted as well! ;)

content: This app is great! So easy to enter information and at schedules. It links with my calendar and I can set reminders and move tasks around so easily. I love the front end which gives a clear overview of all tasks. Everything is so simple. There's no learning curve either - completely intuitive. Absolutely brilliant! They have thought of everything.
replyContent: Thank you for the review. We love hearing that you're enjoying the features! Please make sure to share the app with your family and friends so that they can get in on the fun as well üòâ

content: I love this app and I cannot think of any flaws it has. I particularly appreciate that I am able to create subtasks and to connect it to Google calendar, and that it is accessible on both my phone and my laptop. Regarding this, the synchronisation between my devices has also worked well until now. I don't use the premium version, but I think the price is quite acceptable.

I've been on Premium plan since '14, have tried other apps for comparison along the way, and I still haven't found any reason to give up my current plan. Any.do provides a lot of useful features w/o overwhelming users. Other apps may have a lot more features, but they're designed in a way that overwhelms new users (making them unusable). Customer support is TOP NOTCH too! I had an accidental billing issue (that was mostly my fault) w/c they immediately reversed upon request... over the holidays!
Best Organizational App which has added to my personal and professional growth! it's almost like I'm walking with paper. how can I add an alarm and voice reminder?

The best to do app on the market The free version is just perfect, no annoying ads and no missing features. The paid version is just as amazing, super cheap, super fast to use, every action is optimized, and the whole experience is great. I have a really hard time with my daily task and this app is a blessing. Helped me like nothing else. Also it syncs with calendar and computer which is greatly appreciated.
replyContent: Glad to hear that you're enjoying the features and that Any.do is helping you stay organized! We hope you will share the app with your friends and family so they can try it out too ;)

content: This app keeps me productive! I have a tendency to try to tackle too much at once and end up with an overwhelming number of unfinished tasks. Any.do keeps me on task and helps me to prioritize what needs to come first. I love that it reminds me what needs to be done and I can snooze it nice that item to another day if needed. I live to add various lists so I know what my task pertains to. It's just an awesome resource for sure!

I have been using this app for 2 years, still my favorite to-do list app from other apps. It has a clean widget I can see on my home screen, also allow me to add a new to-do item straight from the widget without going into the app. I also love that it sync up with my Google Calendar. Moreover, all of these features given are totally FREE! Thank you!
The best reminder app. The UI for quick task needs a little refinement though.. One need to scroll to the far right to get to custom time..
any.do has a great support team and was able to quickly assist me with my needs.
replyContent: Thank you for your review, we truly appreciate it!

content: Love the simple and Intuitive design. Allows me to quickly jot down items to do when available. Highly recommended application to have!

I purchased premium almost immediately, as this is exactly what I've been looking for - simple to-do lists. Can repeat tasks, can set reminders, can add subtasks, can colour code, can sync with calendar, can have several lists - or can just ignore all that and use a simple dump-it-all perpetually ongoing to-do list. Love it. Can also use it from desktop on any OS (web interface), and it syncs quickly. There's a light mode with several colours available, and also night mode with a black background. Separately I would like to mention customer service. I was stuck in another country due to the pandemic, and my card got blocked. My bank took its blissful time to reissue and send a new card to me - meanwhile, all my subscriptions and bills bounced. I got a billing issue notification. I replied, explaining my situation, and any.do was very kind to provide a month of premium usage for free. Priority support replies are very prompt. The agent I was in contact with (Tali) is polite and quick. Overall, this app is a keeper. Finally a todo app that I use - because it doesn't annoy me.

content: Best app for reminders. I have started using it before I started university to help remind me of important things and it has. There were times that if the app would not have reminded me I would have had problems like doctor appointments. I have been available to stay on top of things and stay organised. This reminder app is better than any other that I have tried. I can make lists and I can also put a specific time to remind me of the thing I need a reminder of. Highly recommended you try it!!!
replyContent: We are so happy to hear you are enjoying Any.do and it's reminders :)

content: Great app. Have been using it for quite a while now. It works well across my Android phone and my browser on my Macbook. I use it for tracking personal and work actions. I find the grocery list really useful. Easy to use and has most grocery items in its database so its very easy to populate. Had an issue with it closing lists by itself. Reached out to Any.do for support and they replied very quickly with the solution which required data clearance and reinstallation. Was worried about loss of data but the reinstall went very smoothly and all data came back from the Any.do server. Great service. Thanks Tali

The best To-do app out there. Good layout, organization system, reminders, intuitive, simple, customizable. Syncs between devices and with Google calendar smoothly. The daily planner and widgets are useful. The free version is more than enough to get going, and the premium features are definitely worth it. Recommended! Any.do has anthing you need in a To-do app, no need to try any other apps. The only thing I would add is a Pomodoro timer or similar time management tool.

A great little basic organiser app, nice and simple to use, clear, user friendly and not over complicated, grabs calendar entries from pre-installed phone calendar, doesn't bombard you with notifications, well worth the money. I have just started using some of the more detailed features and am enjoying the simplicity. I've tried other organiser apps that are way too sophisticated for my needs, this app motivates me and I can use it even when I'm in a hurry or half asleep.
Awesome, always looking something like this where you can set reminder on go and this app serves that purpose thru WhatsApp integration
Still the best To-Do list out there with a ton of new features!
replyContent: Glad to hear it, we appreciate it.

content: I do not have a single complaint. This app is one of the most important apps on my phone and has never given any trouble. It has helped my daily life and it is great for tasks, lists, appointments, reminders, to do lists from today, tomorrow, upcoming and then further into the future. You can add sub texts and smaller lists and information you need to remember within a single task. You can sync it's calendar with your calendar, and contacts as well as time and date. I highly recommend it!

I usually don't use planner apps as they can be quite confusing and fill my phone up with notifications. But this app has actually helped me be more productive. I can plan what I need doing and when I want it done by along with a really helpful pop up to remind me at the time. If I can't do it at that time it gives me the option to snooze the pop up for anytime. I would 100% recommend this app if you want to be more organised and productive.
replyContent: Glad to hear that you're enjoying the reminders and the Snooze feature, and that Any.do is helping you stay organized! We hope you will share the app with your friends and family so they can have their productivity boosted as well! :)

content: Once a year I am impressed. Give the app 2 days to properly fall in love with it. Efficient and easy to use, simple and modern layout with pleasant motion animations. Perfect for organising tasks for both simple, fast stuff you do in a day or detailed and structured plans for the entire month. It's. The. Ideal.

Keeps getting better and better with the updates and new features. I only use the free version but it gives me all the tools I need to manage tasks and todo lists. Love that it's cross platform so I can get access on any of my devices. Clean, easy interface means I enjoy using it and it keeps me engaged on a daily basis. Great app, love it...

This app is my spare memory and I love it! It takes so much of my stress by reminding me, keeping track of my tasks...just perfect, easy and quick to use and setup all the things I need To Do. I use this app for her long time, tried few other, in the meantime but back to this one always. Just trying out the desktop version...will see and review that later. Only one little thing...I REALLY HATE when my tasks cut of my ongoing calls. That must change. Otherwise 9 out 10 stars.

The app itself is fantastic, and the customer service is out of this world! Extremely fast, polite, and went to great lengths to fix my problem. And let's not forget the widget, it's absolutely phenomenal. Haven't seen anything like it since ACalendar+ (which I loved, but it doesn't provide the list sharing and a bunch of other things that Any.Do does). Highly recommended!

Really great "to do" app. Allows for adding subtasks, notes and files + tags to distinguish among projects / lists. Very easy. Excellent reminders with "one touch" snooze possibilities. Prompts to plan ahead your day a pleasant surprise feature. "Focus on an activity" in order to eliminate distractions, another great surprise feature. Excellent service response. Only annoying, you have to first save task & date and then go back to it to add tags, notes etc. But overall, superb.

I find the Any.do app to be a great way to capture any to do lists. I love that I xan run multiple lists, share them, and check them off as I get things done. Gone are the frustrations if lising my list, or my oen while grocery shopping or running errands. It's all conveniently on my phone. I add irems as I think about them. It's easy to repopulate the grocery list which saves typing. This app helps me stay organized and streamlines daily errands and tasks. Thank you for the excellent app.
